refnamediv.refpurpose: Find the position of the first occurrence of a substring in a string

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
haystack
The string to search in.
needle
If needle is not a string, it is converted to an integer and applied as the ordinal value of a character.
offset
If specified, search will start this number of characters counted from the beginning of the string. Unlike strrpos and strripos, the offset cannot be negative.

&reftitle.seealso;
